channel.title: CVE Feed for github.com/tendermint/tendermint -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for github.com/tendermint/tendermint -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-25072|2024-08-05T03:00:18.952Z -- github.com%2Ftendermint%2Ftendermint -- github.com%2Ftendermint%2Ftendermint%2Frpc%2Flib%2Fclient
item.description: Due to support of Gzip compression in request bodies, as well as a lack of limiting response body sizes, a malicious server can cause a client to consume a significant amount of system resources, which may be used as a denial of service vector.
